seo_keywords: Tineco S7 Pro screen not working
Tineco S7 Pro dirty water tank error

problems.title: Wheels Stuck / Self-Propel Failed
problems.description: The SmoothPower self-propulsion system isn't helping move the vacuum.
solution_steps: Clean hair from the rear wheel axles.
Place on dock and run a self-cleaning cycle to reset sensors.

problems.title: Solution Tank Empty Error
problems.description: Vacuum says solution is empty but it's full.
solution_steps: Remove and firmly reseat the Clean Water Tank.
Ensure you are using Tineco solution (others foam up and trick sensors).
